backend/main.mo: Defines the main canister actor with persistent data structures, authorization mixins, storage handling, and helper functions for orders, users, designs, and activity logging.
backend/migration.mo: Provides migration logic converting old persistent actor state to the new structure while preserving stored maps, logs, and approval data.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature IDs, affected files, components, and test references for rollback, versioning, and cache‑related changes.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Aggregated descriptions of frontend files summarizing functionality across pages, hooks, components, and UI behavior.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining color variables, theming, and global base styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point loading the React application through main.tsx.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, theme colors, start URL, and icons for installation.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker implementing versioned caching (v54), offline handling, automatic activation, and cleanup of old caches.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines the app’s main router layout, handling authentication, bootstrap checks, profile loading, admin checks, and routing to dashboards or error screens.
frontend/src/components/admin/TotalQtyBr: Displays a dialog showing a computed total and itemized quantity breakdown with styled cards and list entries.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Renders an access-denied message with a button to navigate back to the dashboard.
frontend/src/components/auth/BlockedUser: Shows a blocked‑user notice and allows the user to log out and clear cached data.
frontend/src/components/auth/BootstrapEr: Displays bootstrap‑loading errors with retry and logout options and optional detailed error info.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides a login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading states and PWA cache clearing on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/NoProfileBl: Informs authenticated users without profiles to contact an admin and copy their principal ID.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal for first‑time admin setup allowing entry of a name and triggering profile and admin-state refresh.
frontend/src/components/auth/RoleGate.ts: Guards children by permitted roles, showing loading or access‑denied screens as needed.
frontend/src/components/designImages/Des: Renders a table of design‑image mappings with design details and creation dates.
Displays a dialog that loads and shows a design image for a given code with loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/errors/AppErrorB: A global error boundary that shows a friendly error screen with details and options to reload or clear session.
frontend/src/components/errors/ErrorDeta: Collapsible panel that shows technical error details and allows copying the raw error string.
frontend/src/components/errors/InlineErr: Inline error alert component with optional retry and expandable technical details.
frontend/src/components/exports/ExportAc: Provides export menu for CSV and karigar-specific PDF/JPEG exports based on filtered orders.
frontend/src/components/exports/KarigarD: Export controls for a single karigar allowing daily or total PDF/JPEG export of orders.
frontend/src/components/exports/KarigarE: Form-based filtering UI that exports orders by date, design code, or all in PDF/JPEG format.
frontend/src/components/karigar/AddKarig: Dialog for creating a new karigar with duplicate name validation and submission handling.
frontend/src/components/karigar/KarigarO: Renders a dialog showing detailed order info for a karigar with optional image viewer support.
frontend/src/components/karigar/TotalKar: Displays a searchable, scrollable dialog listing all karigars with loading and error states.
Provides the main application shell with role‑based navigation and mobile/desktop layouts.
frontend/src/components/masterDesigns/Ma: Handles creating and editing master designs, including karigar selection, validation, and confirmation flows.
Supports importing master designs from a file with parsing, preview, and bulk save functionality.
Renders a table of master designs with edit and activate/deactivate actions.
frontend/src/components/orders/Ingestion: Displays a scrollable table preview of ingested orders, highlighting unmapped design codes and showing basic order details. Includes visual indicators for mapping status and PDF-derived karigar names.
frontend/src/components/orders/OrdersDat: Shows a destructive alert when invalid orders are detected in cache and provides a button to clear local cache. Hides itself if no invalid items are present.
frontend/src/components/orders/OrdersFil: Renders a filter toolbar for orders, offering karigar, status, date, CO/RB toggles, and optional order number search. Computes unique filter values from sanitized orders and propagates filter changes upward.
frontend/src/components/orders/OrdersTab: Displays a table of sanitized orders with optional selection mode, RB supplied editing, and design image viewing actions. Handles row selection logic and conditionally highlights selected items.
frontend/src/components/orders/PartialFu: Dialog for entering partial fulfillment quantities for multiple orders, with validation ensuring quantities are positive and within limits. On confirmation returns a map of updated quantities.
frontend/src/components/orders/RbSupplie: Dialog allowing editing of an RB order's total supplied quantity with validation and a mutation call. Preloads existing quantity and shows errors or success via toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/status/BackendSt: UI component showing backend reachability, canister ID, and refresh/copy options with collapsible details.
frontend/src/components/status/Connectiv: Displays online/offline status and pending sync state, with manual sync control when online.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendReachabilit: Periodically runs backend health checks, classifies errors, and exposes reachability status and canister info.
frontend/src/hooks/useCopyToClipboard.ts: Clipboard-copy hook providing status feedback and helper label text.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Fetches and caches the current user profile with error classification and controlled retry behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useEffectiveAppRole.t: Derives the user's effective app role by combining profile data with backend admin detection.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login/logout helpers, and persistence via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrdersCache.ts: Hydrates orders from IndexedDB, merges with backend data, sanitizes cache, and exposes loading/error states.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating orders, master designs, and related backend data with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useSafeActor.ts: Creates a backend actor with timeout, authentication handling, and optional admin initialization using React Query.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and styles for admin tabs with responsive behavior.
frontend/src/lib/exports/karigarOrdersDo: Builds and downloads a printable HTML/PDF view of karigar orders with summary and table formatting.
frontend/src/lib/exports/ordersExport.ts: Filters orders by type and generates downloadable CSV exports with formatted fields.
frontend/src/lib/mapping/applyMasterDesi: Applies master design mappings to orders, producing mapped/unmapped sets and preview results.
frontend/src/lib/mapping/normalizeDesign: Normalizes design codes by trimming and collapsing whitespace for consistent matching.
frontend/src/lib/orders/chunkOrders.ts: Splits an orders array into fixed-size batches with error handling for invalid sizes.
frontend/src/lib/orders/deriveMetrics.ts: Computes aggregate metrics and per-karigar statistics from validated orders.
frontend/src/lib/orders/formatKarigarNam: Formats karigar names, returning 'Unassigned' for empty values.
frontend/src/lib/orders/formatOptionalNu: Provides helpers for safely formatting optional numeric fields to fixed decimals.
frontend/src/lib/orders/generateKarigarP: Generates a deterministic PO code from a karigar name using a three-letter prefix and suffix.
frontend/src/lib/orders/getOrderTimestam: Returns a Date for an order, preferring uploadDate over createdAt and converting nanoseconds to milliseconds.
Checks if an orderType string indicates a customer order by looking for 'co'.
frontend/src/lib/orders/sortOrdersDesign: Sanitizes and sorts orders by normalized designCode, then by orderNo.
frontend/src/lib/orders/sortOrdersKariga: Sanitizes and sorts orders by karigar name, then design code, then orderNo.
frontend/src/lib/orders/validatePersiste: Validates PersistentOrder objects and filters invalid entries, returning valid orders and a skipped count.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/excel/extractIm: Loads an XLSX file with JSZip and extracts embedded images from xl/media, assigning them to rows.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/excel/parseDesi: Parses a 3-column sheet and maps each row to its corresponding embedded image, validating required fields.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/excel/parseMast: Reads master design data from the first Excel sheet using flexible column matching to produce design entries.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/excel/parseOrde: Parses orders with flexible column names, validates fields, handles optional weight/size, and collects warnings.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/excel/readWorkb: Ensures SheetJS is loaded, reads an Excel file into a workbook, and validates sheet presence.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/masterDesignPar: Parses master design files by detecting PDF or Excel format and delegating to the appropriate parser.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/orderParser.ts: Routes uploaded files to PDF or Excel parsers, returning parsed orders and warnings with error handling.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/pdf/extractText: Loads PDF.js dynamically and extracts structured text lines from each PDF page for downstream parsing.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/pdf/parseMaster: Parses master design table rows from flattened PDF text into design-code-to-entry mappings.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/pdf/parseOrders: Parses PDF order lines using table-row or section-header modes, producing PersistentOrder objects.
Attempts to parse a single PDF line as a structured order row containing karigar and numeric fields.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React, QueryClient, and Internet Identity provider before rendering the app.
frontend/src/offline/db.ts: Implements IndexedDB storage for orders, master designs, and queued ingestions with CRUD helpers.
frontend/src/offline/sync.ts: Hook that uploads queued offline ingestion batches and updates sync state with progress and errors.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard for viewing, filtering, and bulk-updating orders across multiple tabs with dialogs for images, quantity edits, and metrics.
frontend/src/pages/admin/DesignImagesPag: Page for uploading, parsing, validating, and saving design image mappings from Excel files.
frontend/src/pages/admin/MasterDesignsPa: Interface to view, search, add, import, and edit master design mappings and manage karigar lists.
frontend/src/pages/admin/UserManagementP: Admin tool for creating users, managing approvals, and blocking or unblocking user accounts.
frontend/src/pages/karigar/KarigarDashbo: Karigar dashboard for viewing active orders, filtering them, requesting approval, and bulk-marking orders delivered.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Renders the styled login screen with branding and an Internet Identity login button.
frontend/src/pages/setup/BootstrapAdminP: Setup page allowing entry of a bootstrap token to initialize the first admin and refresh session actors.
frontend/src/pages/staff/IngestOrdersPag: Handles uploading, parsing, mapping, previewing, and batch-uploading order files with progress, warnings, and error states.
frontend/src/pages/staff/StaffDashboardP: Displays staff dashboard with order tabs, filters, metrics, and dialogs for editing and viewing designs.
frontend/src/pages/staff/UnmappedDesignC: Shows unmapped design codes, supports searching, grouping, and launching a form to add master design mappings.
frontend/src/pwa/clearPwaCaches.ts: Clears all browser caches and unregisters service workers to remove stale PWA assets.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers the service worker, handles updates, forces activation, and reloads when a new worker takes control.
frontend/src/utils/bootstrapErrorClassif: Classifies bootstrap errors into stopped-canister, network, or generic types and extracts safe diagnostic info.
frontend/src/utils/errorPresentation.ts: Produces user-friendly error messages using bootstrap classification and decodes technical error strings.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading URL params, persisting them in sessionStorage, and removing params from hash routing.
frontend/src/utils/withTimeout.ts: Wraps a promise with a timeout that rejects if the operation exceeds the specified duration.
frontend/src/version.ts: Exports the build identifier constant for Version 54.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, colors, animations, plugins, and content paths.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata, known issues, and feature requests related to restoring and validating Version 54.
